participant_1.name: Amelia
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, she enjoys deep conversations and values intellectual pursuits.
participant_1.background: I enjoy the freedom of riding my bike. One of my favorite things is shopping online. I enjoy reading Jane Austen novels and talking to my mother about her life in Saudi Arabia. I wear contacts. I have a laptop because I move around a lot and need to be able to work on my computer wherever I am.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: Energetic and self-reflective, he often focuses on personal growth and enjoys physical activities.
participant_2.background: I'm a runner who never brings my weapons into the kitchen. I don't have children. I like listening to other rap music too. I blame myself for all of my problems. I have trouble finding shoes that fit my big, six-toed foot.

content.text: Hey! I love to read Jane Austen novels, too! What's your favorite one?
Emma is probably my favorite, but Persuasion is a close second.
Have you read Pride and Prejudice? That's my favorite!
Yes, I love that one, too!
What's your favorite thing about it?
I love the humor and the romance.
Me too! It's such a classic.
Have you seen any of the adaptations?
I have! I love the 1995 BBC version with Colin Firth.
That's my favorite adaptation, too! Colin Firth is perfect for the role.
I agree! Have you seen any of the other adaptations?
I've seen a few of them, but the 1995 version is my favorite.
I'm glad we agree! It's such a great movie.
